sentences.en: Brave but foolish, he was soaked by the explosion of water.
sentences.cn: 勇敢而愚蠢，他将自己浸泡在水的爆炸声中。

sentences.en: Don't stand there; you'll be soaked through.
sentences.cn: 别站在那儿, 你会湿透的.

sentences.en: He caught a chill while performing at a rain-soaked open-air venue.
sentences.cn: 他在大雨瓢泼的露天场地演出时受了寒。

sentences.en: He moved on through wet grass that soaked his trouser legs.
sentences.cn: 他继续前行，穿过湿漉漉的草地，裤腿全湿透了。

sentences.en: He soaked himself in the atmosphere of the place.
sentences.cn: 他沉浸在那一场合的气氛中.

sentences.en: He trudged through the rain-soaked woods.
sentences.cn: 他在被雨浇透的树林里艰难地走着。

sentences.en: He woke up soaked with sweat.
His clothes are soaked in dribble.
sentences.cn: 他的衣服被口水浸湿了。

sentences.en: His torn clothes were soaked in blood.
sentences.cn: 他撕破的衣服被鲜血浸透了。

sentences.en: I've gotten my feet thoroughly soaked and feel frozen through and through.
sentences.cn: 我双脚湿透，感觉都冻到骨头里了。

sentences.en: My goodness, you're soaked through. Where's your car?
sentences.cn: 天哪，你都成落汤鸡了。你的车呢？

sentences.en: She's soaked to the skin in the rain.
sentences.cn: 在大雨中，她浑身都湿透了。

sentences.en: The champagne-soaked event took over the city's main thoroughfare.
sentences.cn: 该市的大街上到处香槟飘香，盛事热闹非凡。

sentences.en: The crowds had been soaked and were now nicely drying out.
sentences.cn: 这群人都浑身湿透，现在谢天谢地快晾干了。

sentences.en: The water soaked into the soil.
There was so much blood it had soaked through my boxer shorts.
sentences.cn: 血流得太多，渗透了我的平脚短裤。

sentences.en: We got soaked to the skin.

trans.tran_cn: 被湿透的，浸泡的，淋透的
浸( soak的过去式和过去分词)
